Sr. Tho. VViddringtons speech at a conference betweene both Houses on Tuesday the 20. of July 1641. At the transmission of the impeachment against Matthew Wren Doctor in Divinity, late Bishop of Norwich, and now Bishop of Ely. Widdrington, Thomas, Sir, ca. 1600-1664.
[8] p.
Printed by E. G. for R. Best at Grayes Inne gate in Holborne, London : 1641.
Signatures A⁴. Printers' device on title page (McK. 422[B]). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8] p.
Printed by E. G. for R. Best at Grayes Inne gate in Holborne, London : 1641.
